body_html: It's possible that this happens because the lack of the -fexceptions flag (see https://gcc.gnu.org/onlinedocs/libstdc++/manual/using_exceptions.html ). I'm testing this right now and a patch should be on the way.
body_text: It's possible that this happens because the lack of the -fexceptions flag (see https://gcc.gnu.org/onlinedocs/libstdc++/manual/using_exceptions.html ). I'm testing this right now and a patch should be on the way.
body: It's possible that this happens because the lack of the `-fexceptions` flag (see https://gcc.gnu.org/onlinedocs/libstdc++/manual/using_exceptions.html ). I'm testing this right now and a patch should be on the way.
